author: artlbv
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46489 updating the documentation in the readme of the P2GT plugin and the menu configuration. 
_These commits somehow got lost when squashing for the PR, hence apologies for the noise._

NB! the `L1Trigger/Phase2L1GT/test/test_GT.py` config is actually outdated, so did not even work with the previous menu. @haarigerharald @qvyz 

#### PR validation:

Not needed, markdown only.
title: [Phase-2 L1]: update readme for P2GT menu configs
